AboutUsContent: Since 2017, NovaNest has been on a mission to accelerate innovation. Over the years, the growth and success of our startups have always relied on the invaluable support of mentors who share their experience, knowledge, and vision with emerging teams. Our acceleration process has been built upon mentorship, and this collaboration has been the foundation of all our achievements to date. Today, after our successful journey in Iran, our path has expanded to Toronto and now to Vancouver, Canada. We continue to believe that the future of entrepreneurship is built through the guidance, inspiration, and dedication of mentors who are passionate about empowering the next generation of entrepreneurs.

role.description: At NovaNest, mentors play a vital role in guiding and inspiring the next generation of entrepreneurs. They share their experience, knowledge, and valuable connections with teenagers and young adults who are just beginning their entrepreneurial journey. Mentors also support startups and emerging businesses that are either launching or seeking to grow, helping them navigate challenges and accelerate their success within the NovaNest ecosystem.
activities: Providing consulting and mentoring sessions to startups and businesses
Participating in the design and delivery of educational programs and workshops
Introducing promising projects and startups to NovaNest
Supporting networking and connections with investors and business partners
Contributing to the evaluation and selection of startups for the acceleration program

title: Join NovaNest as a Mentor
subtitle: Share your skills, experience, and interest in mentoring the next generation of entrepreneurs
formDescription: Our team will review your submission and contact you if an initial conversation is appropriate.
Our goal is to guide and support experienced and inspiring individuals in facilitating the growth of startups and entrepreneurial communities.
Completing this form does not imply a commitment or guaranteed participation; it is simply an opportunity to get acquainted and explore possible avenues for collaboration.

benefits.title: Financial Benefits

benefits.title: Professional Growth & Learning
items: Free or discounted access to NovaNest webinars, classes, and bootcamps
Collaboration with international mentors for mutual learning

benefits.title: Networking Opportunities
items: Membership in NovaNest's specialized mentor network (Iran & Canada)
Direct connections with founders, investors, and VCs
Attendance at private mentor and investor gatherings

benefits.title: Personal Branding
items: Conduct exclusive courses with your personal brand on NovaNest platform
Co-create content (videos, podcasts, articles) with NovaNest
Publish expert content under your name on NovaNest blogs and channels

benefits.title: Real Impact & Social Contribution
items: Contribute to the growth of talented startups and teams
Participate as a mentor in NovaNest social responsibility programs
